title: AI Infographic Generator
subtitle: Upload your course materials, notes, or text and instantly generate clear flat-vector educational infographics.

form.textarea_placeholder: Paste your study notes, key points or course content here. AI will generate an infographic based on this.

upload.button_label: Read content from file (PDF / Word / TXT)
upload.hint: You can also paste or edit the content to be converted in the text area below.
upload.file_info: Loaded content from "{fileName}". The text in the box below will be used to generate the infographic.
upload.file_read_error: Failed to read file content. Please ensure the file is not corrupted and is in a supported format.

actions.generating: AI is creating the infographic task...

result.title: Generation result
result.empty_desc: Fill in the content on the left and click "Generate Infographic". AI-generated infographics will appear here.
result.empty_hint: Tip: generation may take a few seconds. Please wait for the image to finish loading.
result.loading: AI is generating the infographic, please wait...
result.click_to_enlarge: Click the image to view it in large size

errors.no_content: Please upload a file or paste the knowledge content you want to convert first.
errors.generate_failed: Failed to generate infographic. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unknown error occurred while generating the infographic. Please try again later.
errors.poll_failed: An error occurred while querying the infographic result. Please try again later.
errors.timeout: Infographic generation timeout. Please try again later.
